name: Caesar Roll
description: Crispy coated chicken, fresh salad, a slice of tomato and ripe cheese in a wheaten wrap seasoned with special sauce.

name: Texas Beef Burger
description: Juicy grilled 100% beef steak with fresh onions and Iceberg salad with two slices of cheese, seasoned with spicy sauceTomato Grill  and appetizing bacon.

name: French Fries
description: Yummy, roasted potato sticks, slightly sprinkled with salt.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A mix of juicy salad leaves, cherry tomatoes with pieces of crispy coated chicken and grated firm cheese. The sauce for the salad: «1000 islands», «Oil and vinegar», «Caesar»
